issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Alloy is currently using Backbone in version 0.9.2. This version is more than two years old! I think that finally is time to move on and update it. This update will certainly bring many new features/improvements and also will please many developers that waits for it.

comments.body:
Hello [~tlukasavage]! Can you please change the reporter back to [~sko]? 

Thanks!

Duplicates ALOY-576 

I agree that we need to update Backbone. I'm closing this ticket only because there's another one already in the system regarding that. Please add yourself as a watcher on that ticket so you get updates as we implement it.
